verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they take <S%H3947><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> for me. <S%H376><s%> From everyone whose heart <S%H3820><s%> makes him willing <S%H5068><s%> you shall take <S%H3947><s%> my offering. <S%H8641><s%>
This is the offering <S%H8641><s%> which you shall take <S%H3947><s%> from them: <S%H2091><s%> gold, silver, <S%H3701><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%>
blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple, <S%H713><s%> scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair,
rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> sea cow <S%H8476><s%> hides, <S%H5785><s%> acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%>
oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> spices <S%H1314><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%>
onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%> for the ephod <S%H646><s%> and for the breastplate. <S%H2833><s%>
Let them make <S%H6213><s%> me a sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> that I may dwell <S%H7931><s%> among them. <S%H8432><s%>

According to all that I show <S%H7200><s%> you, <S%H8403><s%> the pattern of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of all of its furniture, <S%H3627><s%> even so you shall make it. <S%H6213><s%>

"They shall make <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood. <S%H6086><s%> Its length <S%H753><s%> shall be two and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> its breadth <S%H7341><s%> a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half, <S%H2677><s%> and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> its height. <S%H6967><s%>

You shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%> You shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it inside <S%H1004><s%> and outside, <S%H2351><s%> and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> molding <S%H2213><s%> around it. <S%H5439><s%>

You shall cast <S%H3332><s%> four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for it, <S%H5414><s%> and put them in its four <S%H702><s%> feet. <S%H6471><s%> Two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> shall be on the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it, <S%H8147><s%> and two rings <S%H2885><s%> on the other side of it. <S%H8145><s%>
You shall make <S%H6213><s%> poles <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold. <S%H2091><s%>
You shall put <S%H935><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> on the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> the ark. <S%H727><s%>
The poles <S%H905><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ark. <S%H727><s%> They shall not be taken from it. <S%H5493><s%>
You shall put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> which I shall give <S%H5414><s%> you into the ark. <S%H727><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%> Two and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be its length, <S%H753><s%> and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> its breadth. <S%H7341><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> of hammered <S%H4749><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%> You shall make <S%H6213><s%> them at the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the mercy seat. <S%H3727><s%>

Make <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at the one end, <S%H7098><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at the other <S%H259><s%> end. <S%H7098><s%> You shall make <S%H6213><s%> the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> on its two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of one piece with the mercy seat. <S%H3727><s%>

The cherubim <S%H3742><s%> shall spread <S%H6566><s%> out their wings <S%H3671><s%> upward, <S%H4605><s%> covering <S%H5526><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> with their wings, <S%H3671><s%> with their faces <S%H6440><s%> toward one <S%H376><s%> another. <S%H251><s%> The faces <S%H6440><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> shall be toward the mercy seat. <S%H3727><s%>

You shall put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> on top <S%H4605><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> and in the ark <S%H727><s%> you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> that I will give you. <S%H5414><s%>

There I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you, <S%H1696><s%> and I will tell you from above the mercy seat, <S%H3727><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> which are on <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> all that I command <S%H6680><s%> you for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood. <S%H6086><s%> Two cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be its length, <S%H753><s%> and a cubit <S%H520><s%> its breadth, <S%H7341><s%> and one and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> its height. <S%H6967><s%>
You shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> molding <S%H2213><s%> around it. <S%H5439><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a rim <S%H4526><s%> of a handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it. <S%H6213><s%> You shall make a golden <S%H2091><s%> molding <S%H2213><s%> on its rim <S%H4526><s%> around it. <S%H5439><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for it, <S%H5414><s%> and put the rings <S%H2885><s%> in the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%> that are on its four <S%H702><s%> feet. <S%H7272><s%>
the rings <S%H2885><s%> shall be close <S%H5980><s%> to the rim, <S%H4526><s%> for places <S%H1004><s%> for the poles <S%H905><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> the table. <S%H7979><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold, <S%H2091><s%> that the table <S%H7979><s%> may be carried with them. <S%H5375><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> its dishes, <S%H7086><s%> its spoons, <S%H3709><s%> its ladles, <S%H7184><s%> and its bowls <S%H4518><s%> to pour out offerings <S%H5258><s%> with. <S%H2004><s%> You shall make <S%H6213><s%> them of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>
You shall set <S%H5414><s%> bread of the presence <S%H3899><s%> on the table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me always. <S%H8548><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a lampstand <S%H4501><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%> Of hammered <S%H4749><s%> work <S%H4749><s%> shall the lampstand be made, <S%H6213><s%> even its base, <S%H7070><s%> its shaft, <S%H3409><s%> its cups, <S%H1375><s%> its buds, <S%H3730><s%> and its flowers, <S%H6525><s%> shall be of one piece with it.

There shall be six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out of its sides: <S%H6654><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> out of its one <S%H259><s%> side, <S%H6654><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> out of its other <S%H8145><s%> side; <S%H6654><s%>

three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond blossoms <S%H8246><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> branch, <S%H7070><s%> a bud <S%H3730><s%> and a flower; <S%H6525><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond blossoms <S%H8246><s%> in the other <S%H259><s%> branch, <S%H7070><s%> a bud <S%H3730><s%> and a flower, <S%H6525><s%> so for the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out of the lampstand; <S%H4501><s%>
and in the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond blossoms, <S%H8246><s%> its buds <S%H3730><s%> and its flowers; <S%H6525><s%>

and a bud <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it, <S%H3730><s%> and a bud under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it, <S%H3730><s%> and a bud under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it, <S%H8337><s%> for the six branches <S%H7070><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out of the lampstand. <S%H4501><s%>
Their buds <S%H3730><s%> and their branches <S%H7070><s%> shall be of one piece with it, <S%H259><s%> all of it one beaten work <S%H4749><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> its lamps <S%H5216><s%> seven, <S%H7651><s%> and they shall light <S%H5927><s%> its lamps <S%H5216><s%> to give light <S%H5927><s%> to the space in front <S%H5676><s%> of it. <S%H6440><s%>
Its snuffers <S%H4457><s%> and its snuff dishes <S%H4289><s%> shall be of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>
It shall be made <S%H6213><s%> of a talent <S%H3603><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> with all these accessories. <S%H3627><s%>
See <S%H7200><s%> that you make <S%H6213><s%> them after their pattern, <S%H8403><s%> which has been shown <S%H7200><s%> to you on the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>
